name: Fisherman's Estafette
description:
Fisherman's Estafette is a fishing game, made for the Ludum Dare 40 with the theme "The more you have, the worse it is".

You have to catch more and more fishes in the three areas, to upgrade your ship and be the best fisherman on your island.
Watch out the sharks! The more fish you have on your boat, the more tricky it becomes to drive your boat. Don't drop fishes, it may attract the sharks...

Team

  • Thomas TEPLY - Technical Game Designer & Music maker
  • Romain REULIER - Gameplay Programmer
  • Alexandre ROGIER - Gameplay Programmer

  • Nicolas LEAL - Game Designer & Project Manager

  • Raphaël DE SOUSA - Game Designer

  • Morgan BARRIERE - Game Designer

  • Jules SORNAY - Artist

Controls

  • WASD or ZQSD to drive the boat

  • SPACEBAR to pull up or down the net

  • 1,2,3,4 to change the net if you’ve bought some at the store

  • Use the mouse to look around you
